strategy: Daemonic Incursion armies have a strategy rating of 0.
initiative: All Daemon formations have an initiative of 1+. Mortal formations have an initiative of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on a Daemonic Incursion, aided and abetted by mortal Chaos Cultist allies.

units: Herald of Khorne on Skull Cannon

sections.name: Daemonic Incursion Specials
sections.description: The Army must include one Chaos Gate

formations.name: 1 Chaos Gate
formations.units: Replace one objective marker in the Daemonic Incursion player's half of the table with a Chaos Gate. It counts both as an objective and a Chaos Gate.

sections.name: 1+ Exalted Greater Daemons. Max one for each part of 1000 points in the army.

formations.name: Slaneesh Legion of Excess
formations.units: Three Herald of Slaanesh, five Lesser Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Plague Legion of Nurgle
formations.units: Three Herald of Nurgle, five Lesser Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Blood Legion of Khorne
formations.units: Three Herald of Khorne on Juggernauts and/or Skull Cannons, five Lesser Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Scintillating Legion of Tzeench
formations.units: Three Herald of Tzeench, five Lesser Daemon Pool points

sections.name: Mortals
sections.description: Up to a fourth of the points available may be spent on these formations

formations.name: Lost and the Damned
formations.units: One Demagogue or Aspiring Champion of Chaos Undivided, one Chaos Icon, five Chaos Cultists and/or Mutants

sections.name: Daemon Pool
sections.description: Any amount may be spent on Daemon Pool points

formations.name: Lesser Daemon Pool
formations.units: Any amount of Lesser Daemon Pool points

upgrades.title: Daemonic Incursion Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: Keeper of Secrets
items.description: Replace three Heralds of Slaanesh with a Keeper of Secrets

items.name: Great Unclean One
items.description: Replace three Heralds of Nurgle with a Great Unclean One

items.name: Bloodthirster
items.description: Replace three Heralds of Khorne with a Bloodthirster

items.name: Lord of Change
items.description: Replace three Heralds of Tzeench with a Lord of Change

items.name: Herald Mounts
items.description: Replace three Heralds with Mounted Heralds

items.name: Chaos Spawn
items.description: Replace up to three Cultists/Mutants with Chaos Spawn
